awards.title: Most Downloaded App
awards.description: Awarded to the app with the highest number of downloads in the store.

awards.title: Most Used App
awards.description: Awarded to the app with the highest active usage over a 30-day period.

awards.title: Best New App
awards.description: Awarded to the best app launched in the past year, based on innovation and user feedback.

awards.title: Best App Design
awards.description: Awarded to the app with the most visually appealing and user-friendly design.

awards.title: Best Customer Support
awards.description: Awarded to the app with the most responsive and helpful customer support.

awards.title: Most Innovative App
awards.description: Awarded to the app that brought new and creative features to its category.
